channel.title: Server login help!
channel.description: Okay, so im trying to make my first private server... nothing fancy, so i followed stormcutters tut, and after everything, it still says 'error connecting to server' i beleive its the runserver or compile or something like that so can someone tell me exactly what to do with the runserver and how to get it working step by step.. also a client that will work for it? ive been trying to use reapage scape 2 runserver.. and client.silabsoft.org...

item.title: Server login help!
item.dc:creator: @santacruz santacruz
item.description:
@santacruz wrote:

ok, i disabled my firewall, that COULD be the problem but i disabled it… so i dont see how it could effect it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2008, 03:54:03 pm[/size][hr]also, can u give me a link to a silabsoft client… my internet wont load silabsoft.org

Read full topic

item.title: Server login help!
item.dc:creator: @pk3zoi pk3zoi
item.description:
@pk3zoi wrote:

First, use the client.silabsoft.org client (lol) and make sure when you compile it, it says ‘compiled correctly’ with NO errors. then click your runserver and it should hopefully work, you have to add the port ‘43594’ into your firewall exceptions, and you need to do portfowarding.

Read full topic

item.description:

Okay, so im trying to make my first private server… nothing fancy, so i followed stormcutters tut, and after everything, it still says ‘error connecting to server’
i beleive its the runserver or compile or something like that
so can someone tell me exactly what to do with the runserver and how to get it working step by step…
